L7p:Comment.stringValue: API Portal Authentication & Management Policy v2.5 as of 2013-05-07 1900 //RR

L7p:value.stringValue: //this makes sure we always have the original request
//Update this assertion if you need a higher throughput or limit
//if customer doesn't have an attribute for organization and you need a pre-determine 1 organization for all ldap users will belong
//initialize, should be empty, DO NOT MODIFY!
//initialize, should be empty, DO NOT MODIFY!
//if true, the authorization will be done against all the auth providers irregardless of the provider requested
//we only support only ONE LDAP provider for Management
//for MS AD - normal group attribute is "member" for OpenLDAP its "uniqueMember"
//for MS AD - normal username attribute is "sAMAccountName" for OpenLDAP its "cn"
//for MS AD - normal password attribute is "unicodePwd" for OpenLDAP its "userPassword"
//always false of MSAD, always true for openLDAP
//if true, dumps the XML LDAP Operation and other info for troubleshooting
//make sure it's the valid entity_type we are expecting

L7p:ResourceInfo.L7p:Document:
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:L7gims="http://www.layer7tech.com/2012/12/gims" xmlns:l7="http://ns.l7tech.com/2013/01/ldap-manage" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output encoding="UTF-8" indent="yes" method="xml" omit-xml-declaration="yes" version="1.0"/> <xsl:param name="user.operation" select="'CREATE'"/> <xsl:param name="user_dn_create_format" select="'CN=richard'"/> <xsl:param name="ldap_attributes" select="'dummy'"/> <xsl:param name="username_attribute" select="'sAMAccountName'"/> <xsl:param name="password_attribute" select="'unicodePwd'"/> <xsl:param name="has_uid_attribute" select="'false'"/> <xsl:param name="username" select="''"/> <xsl:strip-space elements="*"/> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="L7gims:user"> <l7:LDAPOperation> <l7:operation><xsl:value-of select="$user.operation"/></l7:operation> <l7:dn><xsl:value-of select="$user_dn_create_format"/></l7:dn> <l7:attributes> <xsl:value-of disable-output-escaping="yes" select="$ldap_attributes"/> <xsl:apply-templates/> <xsl:if test="$has_uid_attribute = 'true'"> <l7:attribute> <l7:name>uid</l7:name> <l7:value><xsl:value-of select="$username"/></l7:value> </l7:attribute> </xsl:if> </l7:attributes> </l7:LDAPOperation> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="L7gims:user/L7gims:attr"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="L7gims:attr-name/text()='userPassword' and L7gims:attr-value=''"> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <l7:attribute> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="L7gims:attr-name/text()='login'"> <l7:name><xsl:value-of select="$username_attribute"/></l7:name> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="L7gims:attr-name/text()='userPassword'"> <l7:name><xsl:value-of select="$password_attribute"/></l7:name> <xsl:if test="$password_attribute = 'unicodePwd'"> <l7:format>unicodePwd</l7:format> </xsl:if> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <l7:name><xsl:value-of select="L7gims:attr-name"/></l7:name> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <l7:value><xsl:value-of select="L7gims:attr-value"/></l7:value> </l7:attribute> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="L7gims:group/L7gims:attr"/> <xsl:template match="L7gims:dn"/>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:L7gims="http://www.layer7tech.com/2012/12/gims" xmlns:l7="http://ns.l7tech.com/2013/01/ldap-manage" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output encoding="UTF-8" indent="yes" method="xml" omit-xml-declaration="yes" version="1.0"/> <xsl:param name="group_dn" select="'CN=Please set group_dn context variable'"/> <xsl:param name="user_dn_member_format" select="'CN=richard'"/> <xsl:param name="group_attribute" select="'member'"/> <xsl:strip-space elements="*"/> <xsl:template match="/"> <l7:LDAPOperation xmlns:L7gims="http://www.layer7tech.com/2012/12/gims" xmlns:l7="http://ns.l7tech.com/2013/01/ldap-manage"> <l7:operation>UPDATE</l7:operation> <l7:dn><xsl:value-of select="$group_dn"/></l7:dn> <l7:attributes> <l7:attribute> <l7:action>ADD</l7:action> <l7:name><xsl:value-of select="$group_attribute"/></l7:name> <l7:value><xsl:value-of select="$user_dn_member_format"/></l7:value> </l7:attribute> </l7:attributes> </l7:LDAPOperation> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="L7gims:group"/> <xsl:template match="L7gims:user"/> <xsl:template match="L7gims:dn"/>
</xsl:stylesheet>

L7p:value.stringValue: //make sure it's the valid entity_type we are expecting
//since GEt /user would have output already set
//This Login Form section is for TESTING ONLY, SHOULD BE DELETED IN A PRODUCTION SYSTEM!!!
//catch condition for Unknown or Unsupported Operation
//this makes sure we always have the original request
//make sure to cleanup the password to prevent the plaintext password from being logged
